[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [Text](./node-core-library.text.md) &gt; [readLinesFromIterableAsync](./node-core-library.text.readlinesfromiterableasync.md)

## Text.readLinesFromIterableAsync() method

Read lines from an iterable object that returns strings or buffers, and return a generator that produces the lines as strings. The lines will not include the newline characters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static readLinesFromIterableAsync(iterable: AsyncIterable<string | Buffer>, options?: IReadLinesFromIterableOptions): AsyncGenerator<string>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

AsyncIterable&lt;string \| Buffer&gt;


</td><td>

An iterable object that returns strings or buffers


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[IReadLinesFromIterableOptions](./node-core-library.ireadlinesfromiterableoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options used when reading the lines from the provided iterable


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

AsyncGenerator&lt;string&gt;
